headline.main: Conviction Upheld of Arms Dealer Dubbed Merchant of Death
headline.print_headline: Conviction Upheld of Arms Dealer Dubbed Merchant of Death

docs.snippet: A federal appeals court has denied the latest bid by a notorious Russian arms dealer dubbed the Merchant of Death to get his conviction overturned....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court has denied the latest bid by a notorious Russian arms dealer dubbed the Merchant of Death to get his conviction overturned.

headline.main: This Thanksgiving, Be Thankful for Science

docs.snippet: We're not saying you can't talk about politics on Thanksgiving. But here are some conversation starters about science and medicine for your dinner table....
docs.lead_paragraph: We're not saying you can't talk about politics on Thanksgiving. But here are some conversation starters about science and medicine for your dinner table.

headline.main: Three Big American Banks Pose Greater Systemic Risk, Regulator Says
headline.print_headline: Global Regulator Says 3 U.S. Banks Pose Greater Risk

docs.snippet: Citigroup, Bank of America and Wells Fargo each moved up a notch in the annual risk rankings of banks deemed to be globally important....
docs.abstract: Financial Stability Board, Switzerland-based group that assesses global financial risks, moves Citigroup, Bank of America, Wells Fargo and Industrial and Commerce Bank of China up on their latest ranking of so-called global systemically important banks; move means banks now pose greater risk to global financial system, and subjects them to additional capital requirements; organization also deems Barclays, HSBC and Morgan Stanley as less risky.

keywords.value: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
keywords.name: organizations

docs.lead_paragraph: Citigroup, Bank of America and Wells Fargo each moved up a notch in the annual risk rankings of banks deemed to be globally important.

headline.main: Bodies of 9 Decapitated Men Found Dumped in Southern Mexico
headline.print_headline: Bodies of 9 Decapitated Men Found Dumped in Southern Mexico

docs.snippet: The decapitated bodies and heads of nine men have been found dumped on a roadside in the southern state of Guerrero, prosecutors said, bringing the number of bodies found over the weekend in the state to 14....
docs.lead_paragraph: The decapitated bodies and heads of nine men have been found dumped on a roadside in the southern state of Guerrero, prosecutors said, bringing the number of bodies found over the weekend in the state to 14.

headline.main: Turkey Should Reject Child Abuse Law Shielding Men Who Marry From Punishment: U.N.
headline.print_headline: Turkey Should Reject Child Abuse Law Shielding Men Who Marry From Punishment: U.N.

docs.snippet: A bill that could allow men accused of sexually abusing girls in Turkey to avoid punishment if they marry their victim would create a climate of impunity for child abuse in the country, U.N. agencies warned on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A bill that could allow men accused of sexually abusing girls in Turkey to avoid punishment if they marry their victim would create a climate of impunity for child abuse in the country, U.N. agencies warned on Monday.
